title: Rose, Vol. 1: The Last Light
description: A classic fantasy tale about a girl trying to restore balance to a broken world. Rose must connect with her Khat—Thorne—to become the Guardian her world needs. But things aren't easy for Rose and Thorne. The sorceress Drucilla has many powerful and demonic allies—all of them focused on stopping one scared little girl who's desperately trying to stay alive and do what's right. Collects ROSE #1-6
author: Meredith Finch
